_sixdegrees._original_small_world_network¶

_sixdegrees._original_small_world_network(N: int, k: int, p: float, use_largest_component: bool = False, delete_non_largest_component_nodes: bool = True, seed: int = 0) → Tuple[int, List[Tuple[int, int]]]¶

Returns a Watts-Strogatz small world network as a pair of (number_of_nodes, edge_list). Note that at p = 1, the generated networks are not equal to Erdos-Renyi graphs. The degree k has to be an even integer.
